item.description:
EASTERN MASS REIA

This Thursday Febuary 14
Randolph Holiday Inn

1357 Main st, Randolph, MA

Meeting time is 6:30PM



Special Door Cost This Thursday Only, $ 15


No Pre Pay Just show up to the door and Pay $15


This Thursday Febuary

EASTERN MASS REIA

This Thursday Febuary 14





Randolph Holiday Inn

1357 Main St, Randolph, MA

Meeting time is 6:30PM









Can you be sued in real estate?



Is investing in real estate risky?



Didn't your uncle lose all his money in that rehab project?



Yes





Hey wait a minute I thought this was a real estate association?



What do you mean it's risky?



Are you saying I shouldn't use real estate as part of my financial plan?



If your not willing to educate yourself then any investing is risky.



Thats why you owe it to yourselves to come out this Valentines to a very special meeting.



Wives bring your husbands, husbands bring your wives. Girlfriends.... oh you get the point.



For the romantics in our group the discussion will be short. For the less romantic we will have an extended networking session.

The best of both worlds.





5 biggest mistakes investors make and how to avoid them



Local investors who have learned from the school of hard knock as well as education will discuss how to avoid them.





Investors who not only to survive but thrive in this market.











Eastern Mass REIA is evolving.



We have some big changes over the next few months.



I don't want to let the cat out of the bag just yet but our members are going to be excited.



We will be updating you over the coming weeks.





[b]Special Door Cost This Thursday Only, $ 15



No Pre Pay Just show up to the door and Pay $15

Look forward to seeing many new faces this month.

See you on Thursday!
All the best,

Derek Ebrecht

p.s. This is Our monthly networking, education, and deal making event, here at Eastern Mass REIA,

p.p.s. Have a deal and need a buyer, partner or financing? Make up a one page flier and bring plenty of copies with you! Eastern Mass REIA is also a great place to make deals!





Eastern Massachusetts Real Estate Investors Association (Formally AREI-south)

Eastern Massachusetts REIA does not claim to give expert advice in investing, nor do we endorse what featured speakers say. We do not give professional, legal, financial or tax advice. We suggest that you get competent licensed counsel before putting into effect anything you hear in our club, whether in private conversation or something said publicly. The ideas presented are only meant to stimulate your thoughts in the field of real estate investing and are not to be taken as professional advice. All investing comes with risk; therefore, as adults, it is your responsibility to exercise due diligence before making any purchase, great or small. We encourage you to be careful when ordering coffee at a McDonalds drive through window...coffee is usually hot.

group.name: EMREIA-Eastern Mass Real Estate Investors Assoc.

item.name: Eastern Massachusetts Real Estate Investment Association February Meetup
